attributes.review: I am so shocked. I cannot believe what this app did. #1 when I first opened the app the overwhelming scent of spray tan coming from commander orange perforated my nostrils. #2 suddenly I felt a burning sensation in my eyeballs and realized the aroma of bleach coming from the annoying orange look alike was seeping into my retinas. I am so upset with the app itself and the effects it had on my body. I am now in the hospital writing this review and my medical bill is through the roof. So technically Mr. orange lied to us saying this app was free, bc the bill to repair the consequences my body suffered is astronomical. I am UPSET!
attributes.title: Never again luv Xx
